conbody.p: The Problems view pane is located at the bottom of the interface. If the properties of an element are incorrect or incomplete, the Problems view pane provides a detailed error and/or warning log about these errors. The widget in the diagram that contains the error is also marked with a red x-shaped icon. The logs in the Problems view pane are system-generated and you cannot modify them. From the logs, you can double-click on any item and its related widget is highlighted in the diagram.
The Problems view pane contains the following icons:

strow.stentry: Opens a pop-up window that you can use to select (or filter) the types of errors that are displayed.
Provides sort and filter features to help navigate through the errors/warnings.

conbody.p: Tip To enlarge the Problems view pane, use the divider bars to resize the area.
